verses.verse: Also<WH1121>, you son of man<WH120>, prophesy<WH5012> unto the mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559>, You mountains<WH2022> of Israel<WH3478>, hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068>:

Therefore you shall devour<WH398> men<WH120> no more<WH7921>, neither bereave your nations<WH1471> any more<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>.

Moreover the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

And I will sanctify<WH6942> my great<WH1419> name<WH8034>, which was profaned<WH2490> among the heathen<WH1471>, which you have profaned<WH2490> in the midst<WH8432> of them<WH1471>; and the heathen shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH3068>, says<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>, when I shall be sanctified<WH6942> in you before their eyes<WH5869>.
For I will take<WH3947> you from among<WH4480> the heathen<WH1471>, and gather<WH6908> you out of all countries<WH776>, and will bring<WH935> you into your own land<WH127>.
Then will I sprinkle<WH2236> clean<WH2889> water<WH4325> upon you<WH2891>, and you shall be clean: from all your filthiness<WH2932>, and from all your idols<WH1544>, will I cleanse you<WH2891>.

And I will put<WH5414> my spirit<WH7307> inside<WH7130> you<WH6213>, and cause you to walk<WH3212> in my statutes<WH2706>, and you shall keep<WH8104> my judgments<WH4941>, and do them<WH6213>.
And you shall live<WH3427> in the land<WH776> that I gave<WH5414> to your fathers<WH1>; and you shall be my people<WH5971>, and I will be your God<WH430>.
I will also save<WH3467> you from all your uncleannesses<WH2932>: and I will call<WH7121> for the corn<WH1715>, and will increase<WH7235> it<WH5414>, and lay no famine upon you<WH7458>.

And I will multiply<WH7235> the fruit<WH6529> of the tree<WH6086>, and the increase<WH8570> of the field<WH7704>, that you shall receive<WH3947> no more reproach<WH2781> of famine<WH7458> among the heathen<WH1471>.

Then shall you remember<WH2142> your own evil<WH7451> ways<WH1870>, and your doings<WH4611> that were not good<WH2896>, and shall loathe<WH6962> yourselves in your own sight<WH6440> for your iniquities<WH5771> and for your abominations<WH8441>.

Not for your sakes do<WH6213> I this<WH5002>, says the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>, be it known<WH3045> unto you<WH954>: be ashamed and confounded<WH3637> for your own ways<WH1870>, O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>.

Thus says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God<WH3069>; In the day<WH3117> that I shall have cleansed<WH2891> you from all your iniquities<WH5771> I will also cause you to live<WH3427> in the cities<WH5892>, and the wastes<WH2723> shall be built<WH1129>.
And the desolate<WH8074> land<WH776> shall be tilled<WH5647>, whereas it lay desolate<WH8077> in the sight<WH5869> of all that passed by<WH5674>.

And they shall say<WH559>, This<WH1977> land<WH776> that was desolate<WH8074> is become like the garden<WH1588> of Eden<WH5731>; and the waste<WH2720> and desolate<WH8074> and ruined<WH2040> cities<WH5892> are become fenced<WH1219>, and are inhabited<WH3427>.
